page.title: 09Employment in Seaton
page.content: There are 158 people in the Rutland village of Seaton. 26 of these are children, and 19 are past retirement age; 2 are unemployed and 2 redundant. There were 7 people whose occupation was not known. Of the remaining 102 people: 28 women were housewives 17 people worked in industry 12 worked in business or commerce 10 were farmers 5 were students 5 were shopkeepers or assistants 4 were teachers 4 were nurses 3 were technical authors 3 were secretaries 2 were social workers 2 were in the armed forces 2 were draughtsmen There was 1 lorrydriver,1 council worker,1 railwayman and 1 nanny.
